description: godoc: make examples editable and runnable in playground

messages.text:
Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM only looked at the non .go files. https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/10007/doc/play/playground.js File doc/play/playground.js (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/10007/doc/play/playground.js#newcode122 doc/play/playground.js:122: if (window.history && unwrap? this is hard to read. https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/10007/lib/godoc/example.html File lib/godoc/example.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/10007/lib/godoc/example.html#newcode15 lib/godoc/example.html:15: Format typo: "Format"

Hi Dave, can you please review the javascript/template parts of this? gri has already reviewed the go code.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/20002/doc/play/playground.js
File doc/play/playground.js (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/20002/doc/play/playground.js#newcode1
doc/play/playground.js:1: // Copyright 2012 The Go Authors. All rights reserved.
This is just synchronizing playground.js with the go-playground repo.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=284f6a1e531b *** godoc: make examples editable and runnable in playground R=dsymonds CC=golang-dev http://codereview.appspot.com/6523045 http://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/10007/doc/play/playground.js File doc/play/playground.js (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/10007/doc/play/playground.js#newcode122 doc/play/playground.js:122: if (window.history && On 2012/10/04 06:00:13, dsymonds wrote: > unwrap? this is hard to read. This is syncing to the playground.js in the go-playground repo, so I won't make the change in this CL, but I agree. http://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/10007/lib/godoc/example.html File lib/godoc/example.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/10007/lib/godoc/example.html#newcode15 lib/godoc/example.html:15: Format On 2012/10/04 06:00:13, dsymonds wrote: > typo: "Format" Done.

I'm still working on the UI for this. Please review the godoc changes primarily.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/14001/doc/play/playground.js
File doc/play/playground.js (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/14001/doc/play/playground.js#newcode1
doc/play/playground.js:1: // Copyright 2012 The Go Authors. All rights reserved.
This merely syncs playground.js from https://code.google.com/p/go-playground

Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

FYI

https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/14001/src/cmd/godoc/godoc.go
File src/cmd/godoc/godoc.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/14001/src/cmd/godoc/godoc.go#newcode359
src/cmd/godoc/godoc.go:359: buf := new(bytes.Buffer)
I usually wrote

var buf bytes.Buffer

for this kind of buffer use in this file

https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/14001/src/cmd/godoc/main.go
File src/cmd/godoc/main.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/14001/src/cmd/godoc/main.go#newcode357
src/cmd/godoc/main.go:357: } else if bp, err := build.Import(path, "", build.FindOnly); err == nil && bp.Dir != "" && bp.ImportPath != "" {
didn't we discuss this earlier and decided it's not needed?

https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/14001/src/cmd/godoc/main.go#newcode485
src/cmd/godoc/main.go:485: defer resp.Body.Close()
can't this simply be done after the Copy, w/o defer?

https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/14001/src/cmd/godoc/godoc.go
File src/cmd/godoc/godoc.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/14001/src/cmd/godoc/godoc.go#newcode359
src/cmd/godoc/godoc.go:359: buf := new(bytes.Buffer)
On 2012/10/03 17:49:21, gri wrote:
> I usually wrote
> 
> var buf bytes.Buffer
> 
> for this kind of buffer use in this file

Done.

https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/14001/src/cmd/godoc/main.go

src/cmd/godoc/main.go:357: } else if bp, err := build.Import(path, "", build.FindOnly); err == nil && bp.Dir != "" && bp.ImportPath != "" {
On 2012/10/03 17:49:21, gri wrote:
> didn't we discuss this earlier and decided it's not needed?

Yes, sorry. I forgot to revert the change after deleting the old CL.

https://codereview.appspot.com/6523045/diff/14001/src/cmd/godoc/main.go#newcode485
